name: Salt and Pepper
description:
Trapped in an old TV set, a poor cat must climb its way to victory! Help her ascend to the summit of this ever-changing tower while avoiding watchful eyes and her own traitorous shadows. If the apparitions get too close, collect a special powerup to eat them and bring color back into the world. Do your best to collect coins along the way and set a record in the high score tables!

Supports either mouse and keyboard or a gamepad!

  • Move: WASD, arrow keys, or left stick.
  • Jump: Space or A button.
  • Pause: Escape or start button.

Thanks for playing! Contact  me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
